name: Karen's First Place Chili
author: Karen Pugh
summary: I won first place 3 times with this recipe, and gave the recipe to a friend and he won first place with it also.
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with green chile peppers (such as RO*TEL®)
3 tablespoons masa harina (instant corn masa mix)
directions: Place the pork sausage, beef, and onion into a large skillet over medium heat, and cook, stirring frequently, until the meat is browned, about 15 minutes
Break the meat up into crumbles as it cooks
Drain off excess fat, then place the meat into a soup pot
Mix in the diced tomatoes with green peppers, chili beans, tomato sauce, chili powder,  , cumin, salt, paprika, oregano, garlic powder, and cayenne pepper
Bring the chili to a simmer, reduce heat, and simmer for 1 hour
